resources.string:
* Added an initial version of the COM CENTER
* Added UPCOMING UNLOCKS, showing each upcoming unlock with progress percentage of 1% or higher
* A few bugfixes here and there
* Fixed the widget (refresh via the image to the right)
* Fixed the f/c upon changing orientation
* Added repairs/resupplies to the stats-screens

Please report any errors you may encounter to support@ninetwozero.com and/or @karllindmark on Twitter.

Thank you for your support!
